summary: Nine standalone colours based on the 7 of the 9 holds and the Civil War Armies.
descriptionHtml:
This is a standalone Witcher 3 Shani Outfit retexture. It was originally imported for use in Skyrim by  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2996604]sumojellybean[/url]. This is for UNP and Vanilla female only bodies. You have a choice between two different files. Each item listed as "Medic" to avoid confusion/errors in game with the other Shani mods out now.

[color=#ff7700]Things that will not happen with this mod:[/color]
I am not detaching any items from the meshes I reworked. I am not adding additional colours beyond what I already have planned. I am not making weight sliders or body slides and not authorizing body slides for the textures/meshes I worked on. This is "AS IS."
[size=4][i]
[color=#ff0000]As always: if you do not like this mod, then simply do not use it. All negative comments will be ignore or removed, if need be.


[color=#00ffff]Both files contain the same colour sets, aside from the first collection. Original Shani Textures not included, can be downloaded from sumojellybean.[/color][/color][/i][/size]


[color=#ff7700][size=4]The first, 9 colours:[/size][/color] the original meshes as they were presented by sumojellybean,[color=#ffff00]
which includes[/color]:

One style of the Medic Necklace (it's just the original Shani necklace)
Medic of Falkreath outfit, boots, boots with tights, satchel
Medic of Imperial Legion outfit, boots, boots with tights, satchel
Medic of Markath outfit, boots, boots with tights, satchel
Medic of Riften outfit, boots, boots with tights, satchel
Medic of Solitude outfit, boots, boots with tights, satchel
Medic of the Stormcloaks outfit, boots, boots with tights, satchel
Medic of Whiterun outfit, boots, boots with tights, satchel
Medic of Windhelm outfit, boots, boots with tights, satchel
Medic of Winterhold outfit, boots, boots with tights, satchel


No white socks and ankle boots yet.




[color=#ff7700][size=4]The second, 10 colours:[/size][/color] features reworked meshes I did for my own game. The waist of the vest has been slightly elongated, and the "shorts" hem lowered. All re-weighted to account for mesh changes. Removed nonessential polygons and body parts. The tights are part of the main body outfit. Before anyone asks, I am not making them separate. These were originally sets I made for my personal use. I will not alter them any further unless there are structural issues in game. Socks and ankle boots not included yet but I hope to add them in the future.

[color=#ffff00]It includes:[/color]

One style of the Medic Necklace (it's just the original Shani necklace)
Medic (Original Shani outfit with the mesh adjustments)
Medic of Falkreath outfit, boots, satchel
Medic of Imperial Legion outfit, boots, satchel
Medic of Markath outfit, boots,  satchel
Medic of Riften outfit, boots,  satchel
Medic of Solitude outfit, boots, satchel
Medic of the Stormcloaks outfit, boots, satchel
Medic of Whiterun outfit, boots, satchel
Medic of Windhelm outfit, boots, satchel
Medic of Winterhold outfit, boots, satchel


[img]https://56.media.tumblr.com/03728792be6d6f8d4e2f150d059f8e33/tumblr_o3w1ssLzVu1v1phuro1_1280.jpg[/img][img]https://56.media.tumblr.com/9c5e3a82dcc024d848990cdd5d03815f/tumblr_o3w1ssLzVu1v1phuro2_1280.jpg[/img]





[color=#ff0000][size=4]You can only install one of these files per game.[/size][/color] If you download and install both you may end up having issues with your game or the outfits.

All items are craftable at the forge under leather. Or use  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64905]AddItemMenu [/url]and search under "Medic" to instantly add each item to your inventory.
All items can be upgraded at the bench and enchanted.

Other Shani mods currently available:
The original: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71557]The Witcher 3 Shani Armor[/url]  by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2996604]sumojellybean[/url]
Black version: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71775]Shani Armor Black UNP[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/9734839]imAarwyn[/url] (it's noted in her mod description she plans to have more colours in the future)
Updated Black Version: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72729]Shani Armor UNP-2016[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2782784]Mebantiza[/url]
[color=#ffff00]
Check the other mods by sumojellybean and ImAawyn. They each have a collection of wonderful Witcher 3 mods available.[/color]

And check my other mods:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72966]The Paige Cuirass[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72509]VS WItcher 3 Ciri DLC Armor
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72348]VS Witcher 3 Triss Recolour[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73952]VS Bella's Lingerie
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72395]VS Witcher 2 Ves Recolour
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73953]VS Silver Amulet of Mara
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74111]VS Witcher Yennefer Standalone Recolours[/url]







[center][color=#1e84cc][size=5]Installation:[/size][/color]
Download Manually or with NMM or MO.

[color=#1e84cc][size=5]Requirements:[/size][/color]
None. This is completely standalone. If you find, though, that the boots hover over or dip into the ground I recommend using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213]HDT HighHeels System[/url] to adjust the offset. That is not to say anyone will have this issue. But as a precaution, HDT Heels fixes all!

[color=#1e84cc][size=5]Credits:[/size][/color]
All original meshes and textures for Witcher 3 assets are property of CD Projekt Red.
Original mesh imports to Skyrim by sumojellybean.
[color=#1e84cc][size=5]
Permissions:[/size][/color]
If you want to alter or use assets of the Shani Outfit you must contact sumojellybean.
I will not authorize use of the meshes/textures I personally altered for any body conversions.
This may NOT be uploaded to other sites. It's for Nexus only![/center]
author: ViciousSARR
